title: How to write a letter to your uncle informing him how you spent your vacation - Quora

response.answer_text: Why do you feel you have to write your uncle informing him of anything? Why do you have to explain what you do on your own time? Were you supposed to spend time with your uncle and chose to go somewhere else instead? If That is the case, Then you will need to write a letter of sincere apology for not considering his feelings first. Telling him that you probably should’ve told him prior to your vacation that it would not be spent with him And that it was nothing personal, you just chose to go somewhere else and then apologize for not telling him first. If that is not the case, it’s none of his business to begin with. You don’t need to “report” to an uncle…. i’m just not understanding why there would be the need for a letter to begin with. are you afraid to tell him in person? If that be the case, then it may be best to write a letter. I don’t Know how close you are with your uncle, but it sounds like you’re under his control. Are you under his supervision and during this time of Covid, maybe he’s giving you a homework lesson? I don’t know really how to answer this except to ask a bunch of questions myself to understand the actual situation And relationship at hand. So I just went with different scenarios by providing my advice.

before you start writing, sketch a brief framework:- salutation like dear, respected, helloto which place did you gowhy did you choose that place-hill station, beach, weather , desert, historywhere did you stay and go for sightseeingwould you ever go to that place againif you join all these answers, you will get your body of the letter
